response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of taking out the steak from the bottom cabinet. The steak is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to take out the chicken from the bottom cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the bottom cabinet.
(2) Take out the steak.
(3) Take out the chicken.
(4) Open the fridge.
(5) Put the steak in the fridge.
(6) Put the chicken in the fridge.
(7) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the chicken
    chicken = registry(env, "chicken_176")
    EasyGrasp(robot, chicken)
    donothing(env)
